burst.msg_body: Multiple burst reads of length 32 and bit width 512 in loop 'ReadB_BufferB_M1' has been inferred on bundle 'gmem1'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
